title: 14 days ban
body:
I take 14 days ban,after i played 5 games,i was reported because i said ,i am 32/4,and report yasuo flame,bcs he flamed me all the game.Please if you have time to unban me.


                                        (I know is an attention,but he don t get ban)



     (Banned acc:XxXGaMeR1999XxX,eune)

replies.body:
If you recently came off of a 25-game Chat Restriction, then, no, I'm afraid you won't get unbanned. Report rallying can be a form of harassment in and of itself, and it really doesn't do anything beneficial to call for reports anyhow - one report has the exact same weight as nine. You can report the player yourself, and it would have just as much effect as everyone else reporting.

If you reported him, he would get a punishment of his own for flaming - be it a chat restriction, a ban, or Honor progression being stalled.

All said, outside of what was mentioned before (previous punishments, etc.), you may want to provide your chat log(s) for peer review, so that we can point out where (if anywhere) you stepped over the line.
I never take 25-game chat restriction,pls unban me ,i play this game from 2013 ,without any of bans

Okay, then if you've never had a 25-game Chat Restriction (or a 10-game CR, as I'll consider implied), I think it'd be best for you to present your chat logs.

One can only jump to a 14-day Suspension for the first punishment from either using zero-tolerance chat, or through committing a gameplay-related infraction (trolling, intentional feeding), so whatever information you can provide from your reform card would be very useful.
Report calling can be considered a negative act, but I highly doubt that alone caused you to receive a 14-day ban. Post your chatlogs and we can break it down for you.

you have to be an advanced chat flamer to get to 14-day ban instantly,I know multiple people who can't keep it in their heads and they are all honor 5+.
Also, you are only sorry after you are punished.
Where is your chat log of the game?

Chat logs and we can break it down for you. 

As noted in the rules; THIS IS NOT A PLACE FOR YOU TO GET UNBANNED. Open up a ticket with Riot if you are seeking that.
